title: Ghostly: A Collection of Ghost Stories
description: INCLUDES AN INTRODUCTION AND NEW GHOST STORY FROM AUDREY NIFFENEGGERHaunted houses, spectral chills, and of course, the odd cat… This is Audrey Niffenegger’s eclectic collection of the very best and creepiest ghost stories, by writers including M. R. James, Saki, Rudyard Kipling, Neil Gailman, Ray Bradbury, Edith Wharton and many more. Eerie, uncanny, witty and weird, welcome to a world most ghostly.A spookily beautiful hardback, designed and illustrated by Audrey Niffenegger herself.
author: Audrey Niffenegger
